divs: Sighting Detailswhile driving on the a6112 towards preston in the scottish borders my wife and i noticed bright lights through the trees,once we turned the corner a ufo was stationary in front of us and as i stopped the car the ufo moved off .the ufo headed towards us,after i observed the ufo a vehicles headlights appeared behind so i moved off;at this time the ufo was directly above us.a few seconds later on stopping my car we observed the ufo disapear over the tree line.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Edinburgh
There were no other sightings in Edinburgh on or around July 8th 2005
